page.title: 13Hobbies(cont.)
page.content: {Football-}Every Monday night I go training with the E.M.U.s at Worksop from 1830 till 2030.First thing we do is run around the field,then we dribble round the cones,and do pressups and situps.We play league matches every Sunday from September to April. {St. Johns Ambulance-}Every Wednesday night at 1815 till 2000 we learn about first aid.We have to wear a berry,a grey dress and a black and red cape.We learn how to do breathing compression, to tie bandages,and how to treat various emergencies. {Brownies-}Every Wednesday night at 1800 till 1930 we go to Brownies. We wear a brown uniform and a yellow tie,a brown belt and also a hat. We play games and make things.We go on parades including marching round Whitwell.
